name: TE Connectivity Ltd.
description: TE Connectivity Ltd. is a global leader in connectivity and sensor solutions, helping to create a safer, sustainable, and more productive world. Founded in 2007, TE Connectivity designs and manufactures advanced connectivity and sensor solutions for a wide range of industries, including automotive, industrial, medical, and communications. The company is known for its innovative technologies that enable more efficient and reliable connections within complex systems. TE's product portfolio includes connectors, sensors, relays, and other components essential for the functioning of electronic systems. The company has a strong focus on sustainability, aiming to reduce environmental impact through its operations and product offerings, which enhance energy efficiency and reduce waste. With a robust global footprint and a commitment to research and development, TE Connectivity continues to drive technological advancements in the connectivity sector, addressing the needs of an increasingly interconnected world. The company is headquartered in Schaffhausen, Switzerland, and serves customers in more than 150 countries worldwide.
ceo: Kirk S. F. K. N. J. M. D. A. W. D. R. F. T. A.

key_executives.name: Kirk S. F. K. N. J. M. D. A. W. D. R. F. T. A.
